alert.note: Alert for Bosque; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 11:31AM CDT until October 29 at 7:58AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... North Bosque River At Valley Mills affecting Bosque and McLennan Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Bosque River at Valley Mills. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Minor out of bank flow is expected. Caution should be exercised because the right approach ramp to the bridge will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 28.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 36.0 feet. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 36.8 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
